Title: Time FootnoteÂ·XI
Text:
We stopped at the edge of Sea of Flames and the two siblings nodded to each other as if confirming something. Then the boy pulled a small, delicate box out of his Backpack, and after only a moment's hesitation cast its contents into Sea of Flames.
Soon the long utensil melted away in the searing heat, and by the time I turned my head, the two siblings were crying little tears.
I've traveled all over the world and I'm not afraid of anything, but I'm most afraid of little kids crying, so it was good to see that I had put the blown up doll in the treasure chest before, and after I took it out and coaxed it, the little kid stopped crying.
Although this old thing did not get into the tower, it is also considered to make the best use of it, there is a value.
